basics.name: Kamal Joshi
basics.label: Project Lead Solvative
basics.summary: 14+ years of expertise and love to work on web platforms

work.name: Solvative
highlights: Successfully delivered phase 1 of y first IIOT based project built on mechanical door
Helped team implementing solutions such as Ably Pub/Sub Channel integration & ElectronJS based desktop app to communicate with prototype of IIOT device
Worked on the second IIOT project centered aroundd dairy farms, I have played a key role in guiding the team to implement critical enhancements.
Such as 6 months of data storage offline, custom calibration chart integration, new control type, 2 different device builds & so on
I am playing a pivotal role in the enhancements of a transportation project, significantly optimizing its performance to the extent that the client now utilize it 90% of their loads

work.name: iFlair Web Technologies
highlights: Led a team of fullstack JavaScript developers
Worn multiple hats such as System Administrator, Sr. Web Developer, JavaScript expert

work.name: iFlair Web Technologies
highlights: Worked on multiple technologies including PHP open sources - Magento 1, WordPress, Drupal, Typo3, etc. & PHP Frameworks - Symfony 2, Laravel 5+, CodeIgniter, etc. & mobile technologies - Cordova, PhoneGap, NativeScript & Native OS
Worked on JavaScript MEAN & Meteor projects.
